ext_descriptions.ext_description:
A Counterbore_definition is a type of
that defines the boring feature of a counterbore hole.
See Figure 1 for an illustration of the attributes.
Counterbore_definition attributes
specifies the measured diameter of the bore
specifies the measured depth of the bore

A Counterbore_hole_definition is a type of
that defines a template structure that provides the parametric requirements for a counterbore hole in a design context. The template includes one or more ordered
to provide a sequence of bores and a drilled hole. When applicable see ASME Y14.5-2009.
See Figure 2 for an illustration of the attributes.
counterbore_hole_definition attributes
See Figure 3 for an illustration of the attributes of a multi-counterbore hole.
multicounterbore_hole_definition attributes
specifies the list of bores that make up the compound counterbore hole by ascending order
specifies the diameter of the drilled hole
specifies the depth of the drilled hole
specifies that the drilled hole is required to be completely through the item being drilled

a shape_model that contains as a minimum an
that is a placement origin for orientation and position

The member of Counterbore_hole_definition provided shall specify that the hole is drilled completely through the item or it shall specify a depth; however the member of Counterbore_hole_definition provided shall not specify that the hole is drilled completely through the item and also specify a depth.
One item in the shape_model shall be an .

A Counterbore_hole_occurrence is a type of
that is an application of the definition in the design context.

specifies the
that provides the parametric data values and geometric reference data values of the .
the counterbore_hole_occurence shall be associated with a product_view_definition
the placement of the hole shall be on the surface of the item.

A Counterbore_hole_occurrence_in_assembly is a type of
that is associated with a product definition that is an assembly.
specifies the components the hole goes through

A Counterdrill_hole_definition is a type of
that defines a template to structure the requirements for a counterdrill hole. When applicable see ASME Y14.5-2009.
See Figure 4 for an illustration of the attributes.
counterdrill_hole_definition attributes
specifies the bore that helps compose a Counterdrill_hole_definition.
specifies the required angle for the counterdrill
specifies the tolerance of the counterdrill angle specification. The tolerance is optional and need not be supplied.
specifies the that provides the required depth of the drilled hole.
specifies the that provides the required diameter of the drilled hole.
specifies that the depth of the smaller hole is completely through the item
a shape_ model that contains as a minimum a an axis2_placement_3d that is a placement origin for orientation and position

The member of Counterdrill_hole_definition provided shall specify that the hole is drilled completely through the item or it shall specify a depth; however the member of Counterdrill_hole_definition provided shall not specify that the hole is drilled completely through the item and also specify a depth.
One item in the shape_model shall be an .

A Counterdrill_hole_occurrence is a type of
that is an application of the definition in the design context.
specifies the property values of the counterdrilled_hole
the counterdrill_hole_occurence shall be associated with a product_view_definition
the placement of the hole shall be on the surface of the item.

A Counterdrill_hole_occurrence_in_assembly is a type of
that is associated with a product definition that is an assembly.
specifies the components the hole goes through

A Countersink_hole_definition is a type of
that defines a template to structure the requirements for a countersink hole. When applicable see ASME Y14.5-2009.
See Figure 5 for an illustration of the attributes.
countersink_hole_definition attributes
specifies the required starting diameter of the larger hole on the part surface
specifies the required angle for the countersink
specifies the tolerance of the countersink angle specification The tolerance is optional and need not be supplied.
specifies the required diameter of the smaller hole of the countersink hole
specifies the required depth of the smaller hole of the countersink hole
specifies that the depth of the smaller hole is completely through the item
a shape_ model that contains as a minimum a an axis2_placement_3d that is a placement origin for orientation and position

The member of Countersink_hole_definition provided shall specify that the hole is drilled completely through the item or it shall specify a depth; however the member of Countersink_hole_definition provided shall not specify that the hole is drilled completely through the item and also specify a depth.
One item in the shape_model shall be an .

A Countersink_hole_occurrence is a type of
that is an application of the definition in the design context.
specifies the that provides the parametric data values and geometric reference data values of the Countersink_hole_occurrence.
the countersink_hole_occurence shall be associated with a product_view_definition
the placement of the hole shall be on the surface of the item

A Countersink_hole_occurrence_in_assembly is a type of
that is associated with a product definition that is an assembly.
specifies the components the hole goes through
A hole_depth is an entity that provides the drill depth of a hole
specifies the depth of the hole measured from the part surface
specifies the tolerance of the depth
A Hole_diameter is an entity that provides the diameter of a hole
specifies the diameter of the hole
specifies the tolerance of the diameter

A Simplified_counterbore_hole_definition is a type of
that provides the minimal or no geometric definition for the hole.
specifies a shape_model that includes the placement origin for the hole definition.
There shall be exactly one item in the shape_model specified by position.

A Simplified_countersink_hole_definition is a type of
that provides the minimal or no geometric definition for the hole.
specifies a geometric model that includes the placement origin for the hole definition.
There shall be exactly one item in the shape_model specified by position.

A Simplified_counterdrill_hole_definition is a type of
that provides the minimal or no geometric definition for the hole.
specifies a geometric model that includes the placement origin for the hole definition.
There shall be exactly one item in the shape_model specified by position.

A Simplified_spotface_hole_definition is a type of
and
that provides the minimal or no geometric definition for the hole.

A Mechanical_design_requirement_item_association is a type of
that assigns a requirement to the product manufacturing information.
specifies the assigned requirement to the PMI definition

A Spotface_definition is a type of
in which a radius is applied to the bottom surface of the outside diameter. When applicable see ASME Y14.5-2009.
See Figure 6 for an illustration of the attributes.
spotface_definition attributes
specifies the required fillet radius on the bottom of the larger hole.
specifies the tolerance of the specified fillet radius. The tolerance is optional and need not be supplied.

A Spotface_hole_definition is a type of
in which a radius is applied to the bottom surface of each bore.
NOTE: per ASME Y14.5
See Figure 7 for an illustration of the attributes.
multibore with spotface attributes
specifies the list of bores that make up a compound spotface hole, arranged by ascending order of diameter.

A Spotface_occurrence is a type of
that is an application of the definition in the design context.
specifies the that provides the parametric data values and geometric reference data values of the .

A Spotface_occurrence_in_assembly is a type of
that is associated with a product definition that is an assembly.
specifies the that provides the parametric data values and geometric reference data values of the .
